name: Need a Hand? (Skill Card)
text:
Generic / Skill
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
Activate this Skill during your Main Phase.
Once per Duel, during your Main Phase, you can pay 3000 LP; Place all cards in your hand into your Deck and shuffle it, then draw until you have 5 cards in your hand. If you do, during the End Phase of this turn, banish your entire hand. 
You must control no cards in order to use this Skill.
